Title: Rescue, Rescue, Rescue
Plot: Dora and Boots are in a situation where they have to rescue Baby Jaguar, Isa and Benny who are currently in trouble simultaneously. Dora and Boots calms down and had to decide who to rescue first and they had to each rescue really fast. Dora created plans of rescue for each friend where she and Boots started with Baby Jaguar, then to Isa and then to Benny.
